Welcome to{0}.By submitting registration to {0} or submitting statement, you indicate that you have read, understood and agreed to accept the provisions below.

1. The articles post in the community only represent the viewpoints of individual users, but not the site. The administrators retain the right to directly delete all posts which disobey laws and regulations of the P.R.C.

2. The site does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, effectiveness and timeliness of all articles, content, information and resources. Please make your own judgment. The site takes no responsibility for any loss caused by reading misleading content in the site or other factors.

3. Announcement will be made in case of routine maintenance or system updating. The site takes no responsibility for any loss or inconvenience of users in case of routine maintenance, hardware fault, accidents, or force majeure.
4. Once disobey the disclaimer of the site, the responsibility for opposing the laws and regulations of the P.R.C will be held by the users themselves. The site takes no responsibility.

5. By signing in, directly or indirectly using information of the site, you indicate that you accept the provisions.Anything not mentioned in the provisions will refer to the regulations and laws. When these provisions clash with the relevant law, the law will be given precedence.
